scenes.description: Shiori examines the script for the juggling trial.
Bijuu explains the low expectations for the trial, and Shiori accepts.
Shiori juggles apples for the audience and banters with Bijuu.
Shiori uses the cauldron as a helmet and argues with Bijuu about the script.
Shiori is told to bake an apple pie to unlock the Blue Book of Responsibilities.
Shiori stirs the cauldron with a giant spoon to make the pie.
Shiori finishes the pie and refuses to share it with the narrator and others.

subtitles.original: You know, juggling hasn't worked for me in the past.
subtitles.english: You know, juggling hasn't worked for me in the past.

subtitles.original: Uh... let me check what this script says then.
subtitles.english: Uh... let me check what this script says then.

subtitles.original: You have a script?
subtitles.english: You have a script?

subtitles.original: Well, good news.
subtitles.english: Well, good news.

subtitles.original: Please all of them having fun so, even if you don't do it right, it's still good enough.
subtitles.english: Please all of them having fun so, even if you don't do it right, it's still good enough.

subtitles.original: Huh?
subtitles.english: Huh?

subtitles.original: Well, if you're okay with good enough, it's good enough for me!
subtitles.english: Well, if you're okay with good enough, it's good enough for me!

subtitles.original: Alright.
subtitles.english: Alright.

subtitles.original: Do your best!
subtitles.english: Do your best!

subtitles.original: I'll try.
subtitles.english: I'll try.

subtitles.original: Alright, let's go! Oh!
subtitles.english: Alright, let's go! Oh!

subtitles.original: Hah! Oh, it's not too bad!
subtitles.english: Hah! Oh, it's not too bad!

subtitles.original: Ah! Oh! Whoa!
subtitles.english: Ah! Oh! Whoa!

subtitles.original: Spinning and juggling!
subtitles.english: Spinning and juggling!

subtitles.original: Yeah, you like that? You're getting entertained, aren't you?
subtitles.english: Yeah, you like that? You're getting entertained, aren't you?

subtitles.original: You're getting best!
subtitles.english: You're getting best!

subtitles.original: Yeah!
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: Are you sure you weren't born to do this?
subtitles.english: Are you sure you weren't born to do this?

subtitles.original: Oh, you think I was born to be a clown?
subtitles.english: Oh, you think I was born to be a clown?

subtitles.original: I'm not saying you're a clown, you're Shiori!
subtitles.english: I'm not saying you're a clown, you're Shiori!

subtitles.original: Oh, so I'm not funny enough for you now, huh?
subtitles.english: Oh, so I'm not funny enough for you now, huh?

subtitles.original: How long do you want me to do this for?
subtitles.english: How long do you want me to do this for?

subtitles.original: Oh, that's good enough! Oh, my luck ran out.
subtitles.english: Oh, that's good enough! Oh, my luck ran out.

subtitles.original: Uh... Alright, let's see what we got.
subtitles.english: Uh... Alright, let's see what we got.

subtitles.original: Whoa!
subtitles.english: Whoa!

subtitles.original: Whoa!
subtitles.english: Whoa!

subtitles.original: Ooh!
subtitles.english: Ooh!

subtitles.original: Huh!
subtitles.english: Huh!

subtitles.original: Huh, it looks like you're gearing up, huh?
subtitles.english: Huh, it looks like you're gearing up, huh?

subtitles.original: Because... if there's an RPG section of the trial, then maybe you can use that pot as your helmet?
subtitles.english: Because... if there's an RPG section of the trial, then maybe you can use that pot as your helmet?

subtitles.original: It does come with a plus three to magic.
subtitles.english: It does come with a plus three to magic.

subtitles.original: Hah! Oh!
subtitles.english: Hah! Oh!

subtitles.original: Where does it say that, Bijuu?
subtitles.english: Where does it say that, Bijuu?

subtitles.original: Yeah!
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: Whoa, Shiori! You're definitely equipped then, huh?
subtitles.english: Whoa, Shiori! You're definitely equipped then, huh?

subtitles.original: You just want me to look stupid!
subtitles.english: You just want me to look stupid!

subtitles.original: Hey!
subtitles.english: Hey!

subtitles.original: Not like that, you know? This way you'll be ready just in case there's a boss fight!
subtitles.english: Not like that, you know? This way you'll be ready just in case there's a boss fight!

subtitles.original: Ugh...
subtitles.english: Ugh...

subtitles.original: Fine!
subtitles.english: Fine!

subtitles.original: I'm only doing this because of love! Ha!
subtitles.english: I'm only doing this because of love! Ha!

subtitles.original: Like this?
subtitles.english: Like this?

subtitles.original: Shiori apparently puts the cauldron on her head.
subtitles.english: Shiori apparently puts the cauldron on her head.

subtitles.original: It grants her the power of... I don't know, mild neck pain probably.
subtitles.english: It grants her the power of... I don't know, mild neck pain probably.

subtitles.original: Shiori, is wearing that helping?
subtitles.english: Shiori, is wearing that helping?

subtitles.original: No, but I feel kind of funny.
subtitles.english: No, but I feel kind of funny.

subtitles.original: Uh, maybe you should try and be Shiori beam, no just to be sure.
subtitles.english: Uh, maybe you should try and be Shiori beam, no just to be sure.

subtitles.original: Come on Moco-chan, don't tease Shiori.
subtitles.english: Come on Moco-chan, don't tease Shiori.

subtitles.original: The script doesn't say anything about a boss fight or Shiori wearing the cauldron! Hah!
subtitles.english: The script doesn't say anything about a boss fight or Shiori wearing the cauldron! Hah!

subtitles.original: Shiori will... remember this!
subtitles.english: Shiori will... remember this!

subtitles.original: Alright, what do I do now?
subtitles.english: Alright, what do I do now?

subtitles.original: Oh, the Nyakuzas say that you can use the cauldron to unlock the Blue Book of Responsibilities.
subtitles.english: Oh, the Nyakuzas say that you can use the cauldron to unlock the Blue Book of Responsibilities.

subtitles.original: All you need to do to complete that task is make us an apple pie.
subtitles.english: All you need to do to complete that task is make us an apple pie.

subtitles.original: I'm sorry, you want me to make an apple pie with these?
subtitles.english: I'm sorry, you want me to make an apple pie with these?

subtitles.original: Mhm!
subtitles.english: Mhm!

subtitles.original: Uh...
subtitles.english: Uh...

subtitles.original: Alright.
subtitles.english: Alright.

subtitles.original: Now what book is this?
subtitles.english: Now what book is this?

subtitles.original: Oh!
subtitles.english: Oh!

subtitles.original: Check this out.
subtitles.english: Check this out.

subtitles.original: Hey, just wondering but, who wrote your script?
subtitles.english: Hey, just wondering but, who wrote your script?

subtitles.original: Well, I don't know. I guess it could have been anyone really. Anyway...
subtitles.english: Well, I don't know. I guess it could have been anyone really. Anyway...

subtitles.original: Where was I?
subtitles.english: Where was I?

subtitles.original: Oh, here! After the Nyakuzas' display of awesome magical abilities...
subtitles.english: Oh, here! After the Nyakuzas' display of awesome magical abilities...

subtitles.original: ...the likes of which no other creatures could ever dream of attaining...
subtitles.english: ...the likes of which no other creatures could ever dream of attaining...

subtitles.original: ...Shiori took the greatest spoon ever crafted and used it to stir the apples.
subtitles.english: ...Shiori took the greatest spoon ever crafted and used it to stir the apples.

subtitles.original: The spoon? Why is it so big?
subtitles.english: The spoon? Why is it so big?

subtitles.original: Hey, I could probably bonk you guys with this.
subtitles.english: Hey, I could probably bonk you guys with this.

subtitles.original: No bonking, please.
subtitles.english: No bonking, please.

subtitles.original: Oh, fine.
subtitles.english: Oh, fine.

subtitles.original: I'll just use it for spoon things.
subtitles.english: I'll just use it for spoon things.

subtitles.original: Just like that! Alright. Think this will actually make apple pie?
subtitles.english: Just like that! Alright. Think this will actually make apple pie?

subtitles.original: Hah! Yah! Hah!
subtitles.english: Hah! Yah! Hah!

subtitles.original: Looks good!
subtitles.english: Looks good!

subtitles.original: Alright, let's see what's inside then.
subtitles.english: Alright, let's see what's inside then.

subtitles.original: Oh!
subtitles.english: Oh!

subtitles.original: Oh!
subtitles.english: Oh!

subtitles.original: Hey!
subtitles.english: Hey!

subtitles.original: Shiori takes the apple pie.
subtitles.english: Shiori takes the apple pie.

subtitles.original: Meanwhile, her friends who may or may not be imaginary but are definitely very hungry...
subtitles.english: Meanwhile, her friends who may or may not be imaginary but are definitely very hungry...

subtitles.original: ...look at the pie with anticipation.
subtitles.english: ...look at the pie with anticipation.

subtitles.original: Yeah, can you do us a favor and leave the pie on the table so we can imagine eating it?
subtitles.english: Yeah, can you do us a favor and leave the pie on the table so we can imagine eating it?

subtitles.original: Oh, my hungry puppies. I don't think you're allowed to eat apple pie though.
subtitles.english: Oh, my hungry puppies. I don't think you're allowed to eat apple pie though.

subtitles.original: What? No!
subtitles.english: What? No!

subtitles.original: Please! Please!
subtitles.english: Please! Please!

subtitles.original: No! Writing is really hard work!
subtitles.english: No! Writing is really hard work!

subtitles.original: We'll see, we'll see.
subtitles.english: We'll see, we'll see.

subtitles.original: Oh...
subtitles.english: Oh...
